cards.text: Internship opportunities for students within IIIT Tiruchirappalli under the supervision of faculty or internal departments.

cards.header: 3) Regular Internship for the External Students at IIITT
cards.text: Open to students from other institutes, allowing them to intern at IIITT during the summer or winter break in offline/online mode.

sections.heading: Summer/ Winter Internship Programs
list: Summer (6-8 weeks): Internship program in offline/online mode (usually during the vacation period)
Winter (4-6 weeks): Internship program in offline/online mode (usually during the vacation period)

guidelines.title: Students who have completed the first year of BE / BTech / ME / Integrated MTech (Engineering / Technology) or M.Sc /M.Phil /Integrated Ph.D (Sciences) are eligible to apply.
On-campus accommodation and mess charges are applicable as per institute norms.
Bedding may be provided on a payment basis; details will be communicated in advance.
Registration fee and Hostel Accommodation fee are non-Refundable.
Fellowship, if any, will be at the discretion of the supervisor, subject to availability of funds.
Internship certificate will be provided upon completion of the program.

table.event: Submission of Application with Faculty Consent Form on or before June 4th, 2025
